fields.name: Consider changing your job:
fields.value:
its simple and free.
Attack: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Visit a player at night. You will give them to option to reroll their role or keep it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -You may not target the same player more than once.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Cause at least one player to reroll and be happy with the role they rerolled into. Host decides if you win.
